#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int cal_hcf(int a,int b)
{
	if((a%b)==0)
	  return b;
	  else
	  return (cal_hcf(b,a%b));
}
 
int cal_lcm(int arr[],int n)
{
   int result=1;
   for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      result=result*arr[i]/cal_hcf(result,arr[i]);
   return result;     
}
	
int main()
{
	int t,i,h,l;
	cin>>t;
	int n[t],d[t];
  
  	
   for(i=0;i<t;i++)
   {
   	cin>>n[i];
  	cin>>d[i];
   }
   for(i=0;i<t-1;i++)
   {
   	  h=cal_hcf(n[i],n[i+1]);
   	  n[i+1]=h;
	} 
   	  l=cal_lcm(d,t);
	cout<<h<<"/"<<l<<endl;
}
